557
 Transform native time series forecasting data into a form for ﬁtting supervised learning
algorithms and conﬁdently tune the amount of lag observations and framing of the
prediction problem.
 Develop MLP, CNN, RNN, and hybrid deep learning models quickly for a range of diﬀerent
time series forecasting problems, and conﬁdently evaluate and interpret their performance.
The sky’s the limit.
Thank You!
I want to take a moment and sincerely thank you for letting me help you start your journey
